statements: SELECT * FROM customer_sales_data
SELECT customer_id, sale_amount FROM customer_sales_data
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM customer_sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-31'
SELECT product_id, customer_id, sale_amount FROM customer_sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_id, customer_id, sale_amount FROM customer_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_sales_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM customer_sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale FROM customer_sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sale_amount) > 100;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM customer_sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, address FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1,3,5);
SELECT c.name as Customer_Name, s.product_id, s.sale_date, s.quantity, s.price FROM sales s INNER JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(sale_id) as total_sales, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity, SUM(price) as total_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 5 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

SELECT c.name as Customer_Name, s.product_id, s.sale_date, s.quantity, s.price FROM sales s INNER JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE c.name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity_in_stock FROM products;
SELECT sale_id, total_amount, sale_date FROM sales;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT sale_id, customer_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, sale_date, quantity FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE LENGTH(trend_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customer_details WHERE country='USA' AND city='New York';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_details WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT sale_id, customer_id, total_price FROM sales_history ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, order_id, product_id, order_date, quantity, price FROM customer_sales_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC, order_date ASC, price DESC, product_id
SELECT customer_name, city, country, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price, supplier_id FROM product_details WHERE supplier_id = 1001 ORDER BY unit_price DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, order_id, total_price FROM sales_history WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_price DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT strategy_name, discount_rate, validity_period FROM pricing_strategy ORDER BY discount_rate DESC, validity_period ASC
